official_title: Physical Activity Promotion Based on Positive Psychology: Development and Piloting of a Novel Intervention Approach
inclusion_criteria:
* Sedentary or low-active, (defined as < 60 min/week of structured physical activity)
* Able to receive and respond to a text message at the time of screening
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* History of coronary artery disease
* History of stroke
* History of uncontrolled hypertension
* History of asthma
* History of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)
* History of diabetes
* History of osteoarthritis or orthopedic problems that limit physical activity
* BMI greater than 40
